name: Pumpkin Luke
description:
*** ATTENTION ON THE MAP PRESS ENTER /SPACE/Z TO PLAY***

Help Luke the pumpkin to climb the trees and collect all the candies around.

Attention to the enemies and all the traps that are on the trees.

To move use the arrows .

You can hide from the enemies by pressing the down arrow key and became a normal pumpkin.

Game Design, Development and Graphics: Mauro Rilla https://misterm.itch.io/

Music :  Adrian Karmanski  https://soundcloud.com/user-590328532
